Bus: 
1]Trichy to Salem
2]Thuraiur to Karur

Train:
Trichy to Erode, Coimbatore

Tiruengomalai in namakkal road
Iyer Malai on the opposite bank.
Take a bath in the River Cauvery. The bridge across the river is the longest river bridge in Tamilnadu. Take a snap of this bridge if you have a camera while pass by.
Banana is very very cheap around Musiri & Kulithalai
Idly is a typical food here. Also, Parotta & kuruma is awesome in some small hotels.Try Masala Dosa in some hotels.
tender coconut is a delicious drink available at each street corners.
Number of good lodges available near musiri old bus stand as well as near new bus stand.

Musician Musiri Subramania Iyer ,as the name indicates, is from Musiri. His
house at 91 Agraharam is well preserved.
